A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
Bribing critics and manipulating audience scores won't save this film!!   
It'll still make a LOT of money BUT... in the long term\, its damaged the 'brand' and diminished its value.

Consider these facts: Its 2nd week box office plunge was the steepest in history.  It has just bombed in China (despite Force Awakens doing well there).  It has prompted a petition (drawing over 80\,000 signatures as of writing) demanding it be 'struck from canon'.  Even its FAKE audience score is still the lowest in the saga. And for the first time in the franchise's 40yr history\, there are predictions the next entry (a Han Solo spinoff scheduled for May) could flop. 

Thats what happens when you prioritise identity politics over telling a good story. You have paid the price for your lack of vision\, Disney!
